Imagery Description: (a) Papposilen seated on pointed amphora, holding narthex, facing seated Dionysos with mirror in right hand and cup in left; maenad seated to right, with head turned to left, resting right hand on altar and holding wreath in left; above: seated Eros with wreath, and to right, bust of silen, (b) Eros with wreath and phiale of eggs following maenad with tambourine and wreath running to right and looking back left
Additional Notes: Broken; much of upper part of obverse, and the foot, missing
